name: Hypnotised
description:
You can play in a simple way. Just tap the screen when you think the ball can go to next circle. When you reach to every circle and move away from circle then you directly move to next level of the game. You have to go to each and every circle. Hope you will enjoy...

This is the updated version of the game that I made during jam.

-No need to wait for any time in level one 

-Trail is added on the ball

-And you can download on mobile phone(android)

I would like to listen further feedback.
